channel.title: Data Extractor on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Data Extractor on PacoChan's Website

item.title: RE GC Background Extractor
item.description: This program can find and extract the room backgrounds from Resident Evil Remake and Resident Evil Zero for GameCube.

item.title: RECV Editor
item.description: Tool to extract and edit texts and other localizable data from Resident Evil: Code Veronica for PlayStation 2, GameCube and Dreamcast.

item.title: Mario Party Tools
item.description: Mario Party Tools is a simple program that allows you to perform several actions to edit Mario Party data.

item.title: AFS Packer
item.description: AFS Packer can extract the files inside an AFS archive to a folder, or generate a new AFS archive from the files located in a folder.
